info.+content: Bombo is a talking car, innocent in many ways, Bombo searches for her mother throughout many adventures and dangers, battling villians and stopping thieves while discovering that she may not be the only talking car of her kind in the world.

title.+content: match uri no bunbuu no maki
maigo no ko zou no maki

yuki nanka kirai da no maki
engine no nai kuruma no maki
inu no chie kurabe no maki
tora ni natta bunbuu no maki
kogane no tamago wo sagase no maki
ponkotsu bus wo sukue! no maki
okashi na troy no mokuba no maki
bunbuu papa ni naru no maki
kyoufu no kawa kudari no maki
kokoro no akari wo kesu na no maki
sekai isshuu haya mawari no maki
amai wa na ni wa te wo da suna no maki
saigo no saigo no daisakusen no maki
